name: Up N' Down
description:
He who flies high falls low.
Race to the top with your friends, use items to your advantage and grab the crown. But the crown is cursed and makes you vulnerable to fall damage. That's why you have to find a safe way down to the finish line to win the game.

Pickup random items:



Parcour your way through the level:

Key Features


  • Parcours skills
  • Usable items
  • Different game modes
  • Host or join a game via Steam with upto 32 players
  • Ingame communication: Voice chat / chat
